# Test Document 1

This is a test document about creating applications.

## Creating an App

To create a new app in Aqtra, follow these steps:

1. Open the application dashboard
2. Click "New App"
3. Fill in the app name and description
4. Click "Create"

The app will be created and you can start adding components.

## Components

Components are the building blocks of your application. You can add buttons, forms, and other UI elements.
